_sText:
HERE IS A NEW NAV FILE FOR THE MAP! [http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/cs_meridian_nav.zip](http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/cs_meridian_nav.zip "") cs_merididian: by K!LLER^WORM Map theme: The map takes place on a yacht in the Caribbean by the port of Tikiman's Island. There are four hostages. The map is not too large but consists of 4 total floors. You can go inside almost every room in the map (cockpit, kitchen, lounge, office, bar, flying bridge deck, and others). Read the README in the map file or press "M" while in-game to see credits to individuals for their help and use of some of their models. ________________ STORY:
A group of US Weapons Scientists were taking a "vacation"
to the Caribbean when a group of armed men took over the
ship. They are now holding the U.S. scientists hostage
and are threatening to kill them.
You now have to enter the yacht and rescue the scientists
at all costs.... don't let them be killed!! They hold
very valuable information.
